An error occured when saving the file
The file was not uploaded correctly
The upload was interrupted, please try again
Could not find the uploaded file. Please make sure that it is not too big.
Can see issues reported by users in the same group
Can edit documentation not linked to a project
Can access the configuration page and edit all configuration
Can access the configuration page and view all configuration
Can access the global issue search page
Can access documentation not linked to a project
Has normal read access to the project
Can access the project dashboard and team overview
Can access project releases and roadmap
Can access issue search and issue pages
Can access the project documentation, including comments
Can access project code and discussions
Can see time spent on issues
Can see issues reported by other users
Can discuss, approve and update code
Can create new documentation pages, edit existing documentation and add comments
Can create new documentation pages but not edit documentation created by others
Can see existing comments, post new, edit own and delete own comments
Has access to internal and restricted project resources
Has access to manage the project
Can edit project details and settings
Can restrict access to specific issues
For own issues only: edit issue details, triage, close and delete issues
For issues reported by anyone: edit issue details, triage, close and delete issues
Can edit title, description and reproduction steps
Can triage issues (edit category, priority, severity, reproducability, estimates)
Can apply workflow actions (edit status, resolution, milestone, percent completed)
Can log time spent working on issues
Can add/remove extra information (links and attachments)
Can edit people involved in the issue (poster, assignee, owner)
Please re-enter your password to continue
An authentication error occurred. Please reload your page and try again
New articles / pages in my project(s)
Notify when there are updates to my subscribed issues
Notify when there are updates to my subscribed articles
Notify when new issues are created in my project(s)
Notify when new articles are created in my project(s)
Notify also when I am the one making the changes
Notify when I am mentioned in issue or article or their comment
Only notify once per issue or article until I view the issue or article in my browser
Notify when issues are created in selected categories
Group similar notifications together if they are related
Scopes are self-contained Pachno environments. Configure them here.
Every setting in Pachno can be adjusted in this section.
All settings related to file uploads are controlled from this section.
Manage Pachno extensions from this section. New modules are installed from here.
Configure the authentication method in this section
Set up all projects in this configuration section.
Import data from CSV files and other sources.
Manage issue types and configure issue fields for each issue type here
Status types, resolution types, categories, custom fields, etc. are configurable from this section.
Set up and edit workflow configuration from this section
Create, edit and manage users from this section
Create and manage teams from this section.
Create and manage clients from this section.
Issue %issue_no no longer depends on the solution of this issue
This issue no longer depends on the solution of issue %issue_no
This %this_issuetype now depends on the solution of %issuetype %issue_no
%issuetype %issue_no now depends on the solution of this %this_issuetype
'%edition' is now confirmed for this issue
'%edition' is now unconfirmed for this issue
'%build' is now confirmed for this issue
'%build' is now unconfirmed for this issue
'%component' is now confirmed for this issue
'%component' is now unconfirmed for this issue
Crash: Bug causes crash or data loss / asserts in the debug release
Major usability: Impairs usability in key scenarios
Minor usability: Impairs usability in secondary scenarios
Balancing: Enables degenerate usage strategies that harm the experience
Visual and Sound Polish: Aesthetic issues
Blocking further progress on the daily build
A User would return the product / cannot RTM / the team would hold the release for this bug
A User would likely not purchase the product / will show up in review / clearly a noticeable issue
A Pain - users won't like this once they notice it / a moderate number of users won't buy
Nuisance - not a big deal but noticeable / extremely unlikely to affect sales
Will affect average number of users
Will only affect a few users
Open issues assigned to my teams
Showing "bug report" issues sorted by user pain, threshold set at %threshold
Showing issues ordered by number of votes
User pain indicator with custom single bug pain threshold
User must be member of a certain team
A widget that shows your most recent actions, such as issue edits, wiki edits and more
Shows a list of your most recent comments
Shows a list of all issues you have reported, across all projects
Shows a list of all issues assigned to you
Shows a list of all issues owned by you
Shows all issues assigned to any of your teams
A widget that shows projects you are involved in
A widget that shows all upcoming milestones or sprints for any projects you are involved in
A widget that shows all ongoing issue timers
Basic project information widget, showing project name, important people and links
A widget with information about project developers and the project team and their respective project roles
Shows information about the associated project client (if any)
Lists all subprojects of this project, with quick links to report an issue, open the project wiki and more
A widget showing a list of upcoming milestones and deadlines for the next three weeks
Lists recent downloads released in the release center
Graph of closed vs open issues
Shows a line graph comparing closed vs open issues for the past 15 days
Displays a bar graph of open and closed issues grouped by priority
Displays a bar graph of open and closed issues grouped by severity
Displays a bar graph of open and closed issues grouped by category
Displays a bar graph of open and closed issues grouped by status
Displays a bar graph of open and closed issues grouped by resolution
Displays a bar graph of open and closed issues grouped by current workflow step
Assign the issue to a user
Assign the issue to the current user
Stop logging time and optionally add time spent
Set milestone to milestone provided by user
Mark issue as duplicate of another, existing issue
Mark issue as unique (no longer a duplicate) issue
Could not connect to the specified email server(%connection_string): %error_message
Time spent working on the issue
A dropdown list where the user can select one or more choices
A dropdown list where the user can select one of the available choices
A text input where the user can input a single line of text
A text input in the issue main view where the user can input a block of text
A text input in the issue details list sidebar where the user can input a block of text
A list of the available releases
A list of the available components
A list of the available editions
A list of the available milestones
Let the user choose from a list of the available statuses
A field calculated from different values
You are not allowed to delete this issue
There are no more issues in that direction.
